name: AstroRush
description:
CADET! Do you have what it takes to pilot your ship through merciless asteroid fields? To make split-second decisions and navigate the very tiniest of gaps? To keep your nerve even when faced with a nest of giant ugly SPACE WORMS!?

* Unlimited, randomly generated levels - how far can you get?
* Awesome retro graphics with a modern twist.
* Incredibly simple controls, but endless, addictive gameplay.
* Compete with your Facebook friends for the highest score.

Well maybe, if you’re lucky son you’ll get past the first level... Let’s see what you’re made of!
